source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Organic modeling in SketchUp and Artisan plugin
items.headline: Sketchup subdivision modeling and uv-mapping
objectives_summary: Model complex and organic forms using SketchUp and Artisan plugin
Make uv-mapping using SketchUV plugin

items.title: After effects CC 2020 : learn after effects animation easily
items.headline: After effects CC 2020 tutorial : learn after effects animation from real projects in very easy way and become animator
objectives_summary: how to use after effects
techniques to create animations
Learn how to animate a car

items.headline: Learn After Effects Expressions in a simple and easy way & Expressions KickStart course(2020)
objectives_summary: How to read , uderstand and write expressions
You will practise and master some important expressions .
You will learn how to get rid of tons of useless keyframes and get your work automized.

items.title: Post-Apocalyptic Game Environment - In-Depth Tutorial Course

items.headline: Learn how a professional environment artist works when creating environments for games.
objectives_summary: How to create modular assets in a smart way to create large environments with little work.
How to create procedural materials and decals to cover a large range of variation.
How to create foliage for games.

items.title: 2D CHARACTER ANIMATION Course with VYOND
items.headline: Easy 2D Animation Course for everyone who wants to create Explainer Videos for Youtube, Instagram or Fiverr
objectives_summary: Learn 2D Animation and Explainer Video Making

items.headline: 5 different Body Types, Faces, and Hair Styles!
objectives_summary: Learn how to digitally sculpt in the industry leading software: zbrush

Learn to use many brushes: what each does and when to use them

items.headline: Learn to model this complex 3d asset and learn more about sculpting in ZBrush for games or film.
objectives_summary: Model a mech head or helmet inside of ZBrush
Add quick materials to the object and render it inside of Keyshot

items.title: SOLIDWORKS  3D CAD for Mechanical Engineering

objectives_summary: Solidworks fundamentals
Part modelling
Drawings

items.headline: Learn how to transfer your modeling, unwrapping, and baking skills into Maya from Blender.
objectives_summary: Overview of fundamental UI differences
Location of most used tools and techniques for modeling
Explaining high poly modeling workflow

objectives_summary: Design and illustrate Flat Vector Illustrations using Illustrator
Have a knowledge of the shape layers in After Effects
Animate shapes in After Effects

visible_instructors.job_title: Apple Pro Certified Trainer & Motion Graphics Artist

items.headline: Learn How to Create a Space Themed Trailer in Motion 5
objectives_summary: Motion 5 Now lets us Bring in 3D objects - In this course we will show you how to make the most of them
Learn how to light and texture your 3D Models
Create a trailer for a film using 3D and 2D assets

items.title: Creating a Cartoon Octopus Monster in Maya 2020
items.headline: Learn how to create a cute character using professional techniques in modeling, texturing, lighting and rendering.
objectives_summary: How to use Maya.
How to learn Maya's modeling tools
How to master professional modeling techniques.

items.title: Blender 3d: Creating an Anime Style Character in Blender
items.headline: Character Creation Course
objectives_summary: Create their own 3d character from scratch.
Be able to rig their character through blenders rigify system.
Be able to pose their character for presentation.

items.title: Learn Animation, The Beginner´s guide
items.headline: Easy steps to start animating
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn the fundamentals of Animation. Using just simple apps, available online, you will learn body mechanics, how to do a walk and run cycle, how to keep the shape of your character solid and how to apply the Animation Principles to became a better animator.
- What are the 12 Animation Principles
- How to approach a walkcycle

items.title: Jewellery Rendering MASTERCLASS
items.headline: Learn to render jewelry using MatrixGold, Cycles in Rhino 3d, V-Ray, Keyshot and Maverick
objectives_summary: You will learn how to render jewellery to a high standard, using a variety of rendering software.
MatrixGold
Cycles in Rhino

items.title: Create a Rubik's Cube in Blender
items.headline: 3D modeling of Rubik's Cube, using UV maps from a single texture image and creating a animation using Blender.
objectives_summary: Select a suitable image to use as a texture-map.
Create a simple cube based model.
Use bevel tools to shape the model.
